get_gregorian_date.name: Get Gregorian Date
get_gregorian_date.description: Returns Hebrew Calendar information for a given Gregorian date.  Pass one or more include_* parameters to specify which fields to return.

date.name: Date
date.description: Look up the specified date or time.  If you pass a date with a time, it will be evaluated relative to sunset, returning the following day if after sunset (not candle lighting). Defaults to today (relative to midnight, not sunset).

include_hebrew_date_info.name: Include Hebrew Date Info
include_hebrew_date_info.description: True to return Hebrew year, month, day, and related calendar information.

include_holiday_info.name: Include Holiday Info
include_holiday_info.description: True to return information about the holiday that falls on this date, if any.

include_zmanim.name: Include Zmanim
include_zmanim.description: True to return the day's zmanim timestamps.

get_hebrew_date.name: Get Hebrew Date
get_hebrew_date.description: Returns Hebrew Calendar information for a given Hebrew date.  Pass one or more include_* parameters to specify which fields to return.

year.name: Hebrew Year
year.description: The year of the date to return.  Omit this to return the specified date in the current Hebrew year (eg, a Yahrzeit).

month.name: Hebrew Month
month.description: The month of the date to return.  You must specify Adar I or Adar II in case the year is a leap year; in non-leap years, they will both return Adar.

day.name: Hebrew Day of Month
day.description: The day of month of the date to return.

get_next_holiday.name: Get Next Holiday
get_next_holiday.description: Returns Hebrew Calendar information for the next holiday on or after a given date, optionally filtered.  Pass one or more include_* parameters to specify which fields to return.

date.name: Date
date.description: Get a holiday the specified date or time.  If you pass a date with a time, it will be evaluated relative to sunset, returning the following day if after sunset (not candle lighting). Defaults to today (relative to midnight, not sunset).

types.name: Types
types.description: The categories of holidays to return.  If omitted, returns any holiday.

get_holidays.name: Get Holiday Info
get_holidays.description: Returns Hebrew Calendar information for holiday(s) in a given year.  Exactly one of 'types' or 'holidays' is required to filter holidays to return. Pass one or more include_* parameters to specify which fields to return.

year.name: Hebrew Year
year.description: Return holidays in the specified year.  Defaults to the current Hebrew year.

types.name: Types
types.description: Only return holidays in the specified categories.

holidays.name: Holiday Names
holidays.description: Only return holidays with the specified names.
